game.name: Core Hustlers
game.shortDescription: Core Hustlers is a single-player sci-fi extraction shooter where every run is unique. Infiltrate derelict stations, hack data cores, outthink ruthless AI, and survive shifting, deadly environments.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Core Hustlers is a single-player sci-fi extraction shooter where every run is unique. Infiltrate derelict stations, hack data cores, outthink ruthless AI, and survive shifting, deadly environments.
